content: A major political row erupted in Tamil Nadu on Tuesday after a DMK functionary allegedly issued a “death threat” against Prime Minister Narendra Modi ahead of his visit to the state. The BJP has demanded the immediate arrest of Jayapalan, the DMK South District Secretary, after a video of his speech at a party event went viral.
